Title: Relates to the establishment of state equalization rates for the Farmingdale union free school district and the Amityville union free school districts
Summary: Requires the level of assessment for state equalization rates for the Farmingdale union free school district and the Amityville union free school districts which are located in the same town, but in different counties, to be calculated at the same time and on a regular basis.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to the establishment of certain state equalization rates for the Farmingdale union free school district and the Amityville union free school districts
